<% scores.each_with_index do |score,index| %> <% end %>
Rank Name Score
<%= index+1 %> <%= score.name %> <%= score.score %>
text:
<% scores.each_with_index do |score,index| %> <% end %>
Rank Name Score
<%= index+1 %> <%= score.name %> <%= score.score %>

diskText:
About King of Strain

We created King of Strain to test your strength, but also the strength of our service. What we've done is connected one of our wireless sensors to a flexible aluminum bar. The objective is to register strain on the sensor by trying to bend it. The more pressure you put on the bar, the higher your score. Score high enough and you could be the next King of Strain.

About Scanimetrics

Scanimetrics delivers a complete condition monitoring solution for heavy equipment: hardware, software, and expert support. If you're interested in seeing how Scanimetrics technology could be used to monitor your critical equipment, visit our main website or give us a call.

<%= link_or_text @event %>

<%= render partial: "leaderboard", locals: {scores: @event.scores.order(score: :desc).first(10)} %> <%= link_to 'View '+@event.title+' Leader Board', event_path(@event), class: 'tablefont' %>
<%= link_to 'All Events', events_path, class: 'tablefont' %> | <%= link_to 'View All Time Scores', leaderboard_path, class: 'tablefont' %>

diskText:
<% @title="All Events & Trade Shows" %>

All Events and Trade Shows

    <% @events.order(start: :desc).each do |event| %>

  • <%= link_or_text event %>

    <%= event.location %>, <%= date_or_duration event %>
    <%= link_to 'View Leaderboard', event_path(event) %>
    • <% end %>
